Companion: I'm getting the itch for an adventure. #$q 500/501 abigailCompanion_followup#Hey @, wanna tag team for a little bit?#$r 500 20 abigailCompanion_yes#Sure! Lets find some trouble?#$r 501 0 abigailCompanion_no#Hmmmm, probably not today. Don't count me out next time though.
abigailCompanion_yes: I knew you'd be down! Where should we go first?$h
abigailCompanion_no: Boo. Guess I'll need to find some fun with someone else today.
abigailCompanion_followup: #p 500 #It's a good thing I have you with me!$h|Maybe I should check out the mines today?
CompanionActions: Hey @, what's up? #$q 500/501 CompanionFollowup#What's up?#$r 500 0 CompanionActionEnd#That's all the time I have to hang out today.#$r 501 0 CompanionActionContinue#Nothing, just taking a breather.
CompanionActionEnd: Alright, well thanks for hanging out with me today!$h
companionBeach: You know, I wouldn't necessarily call myself a beach person, but being here does make me curious about all the things that are at the bottom of the sea.
companionSubmarine: Hey! Didn't I tell you I was curious about the bottom of the ocean?$h#$b#Thanks for bringing me down here to check this out. It's beautiful!$h
companionDesert: Oh my Yoba! Do you see the size of that skeleton?! Think it was some sort of dragon?$7
companionClub: Hey @, am I your date to a high-stakes poker game or something? I didn't even wear my cocktail dress!$h
companionSkullCave: This place is like, the Solarian Souls of Stardew Valley, you know?
companionSewer: This place stinks, but I can't help but smile when I see that little shadow guy. What a cutie!$h
companionMutantBugLand: Just a bunch of bugs in here. Hardly worth dulling my blade.$u
companionArchaeologyHouse: Wow, it's like a 5-course buffet in here!$h
companionTunnel: If we walked for miles and miles from here, we might even make it to Zuzu city eventually.$6
companionWizardHouse: Oh my! Do you think he'd be willing to take me on as an apprentince if I asked really nicely?$h#$e#By the way, don't you think him I and look a little alike?$6
companionWitchHut: You know, even though the witch seems evil, I bet I could still learn a thing or two from her.
companionAdventureGuild: How many skeletons do you think Marlon and Gil have slain between the two of them?$6
companionMine: I'm glad I have you here to help me train!$h#$b#I'm not so sure I could do this alone yet.
companionRailroad: Being here always makes me wonder if I could just hop on a train and journey somewhere unknown and far away.$6#$b#Would you want to come with me if I did?$l
companionBathHouse_Pool: Ahhhh... It's been awhile since I was last here on my own.$b#Thanks for bringing me back!$l
companionWoods: You can practically feel the natural magic in here.#$b#I heard there used to be Sylvan creatures here before early humans fought with them long ago.$s
